Oh, ami sob somoy chintit thaki ebong shudhu protidin saradin sob kichur jonno eto chintit je ami sobematro school-e phire jete shuru korechi. 20 bochor pore ami ekjon grihini hoyechi, bachchera ekhon boro hoyeche. Tahole keno school-e phire yaben na ebong ekhon gato shat, aṭa mas dhore eti kebol dushchinta chhada ar kichui nai, dushchinta kramagat sarakhon sarajatra bari niye chintit school niye chintit ebong eti jibonke prabhavit korchhe.
Tai, eto chinta onek, ebong koto? Koto din? Apani ki bolben je apani ekati sadharan shaptahe chintit?
Koto din chinta korben na,

Ami beshiর dinai bolbo, sombar theke shukrabor, shanibar, tai ami jokhon sombar theke shukrabor theki, tokhon ami school niye chintit, ba jokhon ami school-e thaki, tokhon ami bari niye chintit thaki shaptahante, ami lokkho korechi school asche. Ebong tarpor tara sobkichu porichaloner bishoye chintit. Ami kivabe sobkichu mokabela kortey jachchi tai eta onek.

School-e. Ami ekhon khub bhalo korchi na. Ami jokhon snatak chhilam, tokhon ami ekjon soja e chhatra chhilam. Ami bhebechilam ami eta abar korte pari. Tara ekhono jache na. Karon ami tai na, jokhon ami school-e thaki, tokhon o ami bari niye chintit. Bari te ki cholche je ami class-e manoyog dite pari na ebong eti kebol grass korche.
Thik? Tai school ebong bari te ubhoy? Uhu,

Achha, amar didima, tini mara gechen. Jokhon ami chhoto chhilam. Tini amader jotno nite obhysta. Tini amar kache duiti mayeṛ moto chhilen. Ebong ami tani take sei vabe dekhechi. Ebong ami jokhon chhoto chhilam tokhon sei mara gechhilo ebong tini satyoi chhilo. Ebong eto tai, ami satyoi tiniṛ kachei chhilo. Ebong ke? Amar sheshokaleo amar shoshur-ke nie onek chinta korechi ebong bishesh kore jokhon theke ami school-e phire eshechi, sei amar mitra sambandhe chinti korechi je tini amake sada shikkhaye jete, 10-er sathe jog dite ebong ekhon amader mrito sambandhe chinti koreche. Tai tini,
